query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(data_loaded_at) AS month, COUNT(*) AS item_count WHERE data_loaded_at>='2022-09-01' GROUP BY month

column_metadata.description: the date when the data was loaded
the district where the inspection took place
total count of inspection records per month

table_metadata.title: DBI Plumbing Inspection Division Districts
table_metadata.description: The data in this map displays plumbing inspectors by district.

whom_it_may_interest: This data may interest San Francisco city planning or building departments, plumbers, real estate developers, and researchers studying trends in plumbing inspections.
title: DBI Plumbing Inspection Division Districts
